commit.message:
expr.c (gfc_get_int_expr): Don't initialize mpfr data twice.

2010-07-12  Mikael Morin  <mikael@gcc.gnu.org>

	* expr.c (gfc_get_int_expr): Don't initialize mpfr data twice.
	* resolve.c (build_default_init_expr): Ditto.

From-SVN: r162081

files.patch:

+
+	* expr.c (gfc_get_int_expr): Don't initialize mpfr data twice.
+	* resolve.c (build_default_init_expr): Ditto.
+
 2010-07-11  Tobias Burnus  <burnus@net-b.de>
